def_cn: (衣服、地毯等)破旧的，磨薄的，陈旧的
def_en: Threadbare clothes, carpets, and other pieces of cloth look old, dull, and very thin, because they have been worn or used too much.

def_cn: (活动、想法、论点)无力的，不充分的，陈旧乏味的
def_en: If you describe an activity, an idea, or an argument as threadbare, you mean that it is very weak, or inadequate, or old and no longer interesting.
